author: John Mauro
description:
Following its original publication in 2014, The Girl with All the Gifts by M.R. Carey quickly became my favorite zombie book, an expertly crafted post-apocalyptic thriller that ponders what it means to be human while delivering a steady onslaught of undead action. Upon revisiting the novel this month, my respect for The Girl with All […]

title: REVIEW: The Girl with All the Gifts by M.R. Carey
